tool_description: Provide AI based live cricket analysis for ongoing matches in real-time from a finetuned Large Language Model with cricket data
name: CricGPT
title: CricGPT

api_list.name: Provide live match stats and ai commentary
api_list.description: Provide live stats and ai commentary. If the match ended or yet to be started you'll see a message no ongoing matches.  match_id can be taken from the ongoing match endpoint /ongoing

api_list.name: Get ongoing matches
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://cricgpt.p.rapidapi.com/ongoing"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cricgpt.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://cricgpt.p.rapidapi.com/ongoing"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cricgpt.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
